original_text: My friends, remember that you are really strangers in this world. You do not belong here. So I am telling you not to do the bad things that your bodies may want to do. Those bad things fight against what is good for your soul. My friends, remember that you are really strangers in this world. You do not belong here. So I am telling you not to do the bad things that your bodies may want to do. Those bad things fight against what is good for your soul. My friends, remember that you are really strangers in this world. You do not belong here. So I am telling you not to do the bad things that your bodies may want to do. Those bad things fight against what is good for your soul.
korean_text: 사랑하는 자들아 거류민과 나그네 같은 너희를 권하노니 영혼을 거슬러 싸우는 육체의 정욕을 제어하라

sentences.original_text: My friends, remember that you are really strangers in this world.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 친구들아, 너희가 정말로 이 세상에서 이방인임을 기억하라.

sentences.original_text: So I am telling you not to do the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 나는 너희에게 나쁜 것들을 하지 말라고 말한다.

sentences.original_text: that your bodies may want to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 몸이 하고 싶어할지도 모르는 그것들.

sentences.original_text: Those bad things fight against what is good for your soul.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 나쁜 것들은 너희 영혼에 좋은 것과 싸운다.

sentences.original_text: My friends, remember that you are really strangers in this world.
